criterion-expression-type-object.description: An object used to describe the type and version of an expression used within a Criterion Object

type.description: The type of condition to be applied

version.description: A short hand string representing the version of the expression type

type.description: The type of condition to be applied

criterion-object.description: An object used to specify the context, conditions, and condition types that can be used to prove or satisfy assertions specified in Step Object successCriteria, Success Action Object criteria, and Failure Action Object criteria

context.description: A runtime expression used to set the context for the condition to be applied on

specification-extensions.description: While the Arazzo Specification tries to accommodate most use cases, additional data can be added to extend the specification at certain points

stepId.description: Unique string to represent the step

workflowId.description: Unique string to represent the workflow

description: A single failure action which describes an action to take upon failure of a workflow step

criteria.description: A list of assertions to determine if this action SHALL be executed

name.description: The name of the failure action

retryAfter.description: A non-negative decimal indicating the seconds to delay after the step failure before another attempt SHALL be made

retryLimit.description: A non-negative integer indicating how many attempts to retry the step MAY be attempted before failing the overall step

stepId.description: The stepId to transfer to upon failure of the step

type.description: The type of action to take

workflowId.description: The workflowId referencing an existing workflow within the Arazzo description to transfer to upon failure of the step
